position: Data Analyst @ S&P Global | MBA in Finance

positions.subtitle: S&P Global
positions.description: Bank Rates Team: Majorly involved in collecting data from US bank websites related to savings, credit card, and mortgage rates.Rate Watch Team: Collected and calculated rate changes of insurance products, including private passenger auto, motorcycle, recreational vehicles, and homeowners insurance.Regularly analyzed rate changes in insurance company products and updated the rate filing website accordingly.
positions.title: Data Analyst
positions.description_html:
Bank Rates Team: Majorly involved in collecting data from US bank websites related to savings, credit card, and mortgage rates.
Rate Watch Team: Collected and calculated rate changes of insurance products, including private passenger auto, motorcycle, recreational vehicles, and homeowners insurance.
Regularly analyzed rate changes in insurance company products and updated the rate filing website accordingly.

experience.title: L&D Intern
experience.description: Conducted training sessions for new employees, focusing on skill development and motivation during the Big Billion Day sale.Completed over 30 engagement activities to enhance employee experience and morale.Led the Project Blue Tree team, collecting and analyzing vaccination data for employees.Collaborated with all hubs of the Guwahati office to implement strategies aimed at maximizing productivity.

experience.title: Financial Planning Advisor
experience.description: Provided comprehensive financial planning and advisory services to clients, focusing on insurance, investments, and retirement planning.Developed customized financial plans based on clients' individual needs, goals, and risk tolerance.Conducted regular reviews of clients' financial portfolios to ensure alignment with their objectives and market conditions.Educated clients on various financial products and strategies, enabling them to make informed decisions.Achieved and exceeded sales targets through effective client relationship management and tailored financial solutions.
experience.description_html: Provided comprehensive financial planning and advisory services to clients, focusing on insurance, investments, and retirement planning.Developed customized financial plans based on clients' individual needs, goals, and risk tolerance.Conducted regular reviews of clients' financial portfolios to ensure alignment with their objectives and market conditions.Educated clients on various financial products and strategies, enabling them to make informed decisions.Achieved and exceeded sales targets through effective client relationship management and tailored financial solutions.

experience.title: Global Consumer Banking Virtual Internship Program
experience.description: During this experience spanning over two weeks, I have:- Developed an understanding of the different roles and responsibilities of different teams within the consumer bank, as well as the current product range.- Conducted market research and oversaw new product development.- Pitched my new product idea to the stakeholders.- Planned a campaign for the awareness of my new product, improving uptakes by presenting the performance of the product in my region using Data Analysis to derive the key trends of my chosen consumer base.
